talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry>How did something this huge just appear
here out of nowhere?
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Those voe from the caravan squad are
spirited, but that's about all they have
going for them.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If only they had true strength like you.


Maybe then, perhaps, Captain Ripp
wouldn't have had to fire them.
talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry>I think this is stone, but no matter what I
do, I can't put a dent in it!
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry>No matter how many I strike down, more
keep coming... It's as if we're standing
atop a hive!
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>My heart flutters, even now, to think of
the courage you displayed in that battle.

It is reassuring to see that there is at
least one capable Hylian voe.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>You are quite unlike those members of
the caravan squad.

They were helping us with our guard
duties up until Captain Ripp fired them.
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Well, now that the sand shroud is gone
and our forces are restored, we shouldn't
need to rely on outsiders' help anymore.
